data.title: Riola Sardo Vacation Rentals & Homes - Sardinia, Italy
data.meta_description: Aug 12, 2024 - Rent from people in Riola Sardo, Italy from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Rental unit in Riola Sardo

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 105 reviews4.98 (105)

S'omighedda

Cozy dependance in the style of Campidanese carefully renovated, in the Municipality of Riola Sardo just 15km from the beaches of S'archittu and Torre del pozzo, Sa mesa Longa, Putzu idu and S'arena Scoada and the Sounds Park of Su Tingiosu 8km from the golf course located in the town of Is Arenas. A little further south we find about 20km Mari ermi, Is Arutas until we reach San Giovanni di Sinis with its evocative promontory that divides the living sea from the dead sea with the archaeological area of Tharros.

Vacation home in Putzu Idu

5 out of 5 average rating, 15 reviews5 (15)

[Putzu Idu] Seaside House / Exclusive Waterfront

Stylish house located in one of the most beautiful beaches in Sardinia. This house enjoys a unique seafront location with an exclusive position just 15 meters from the sea, with a spacious sea-view terrace and direct access to the beach. It has been renovated, furnished and equipped with everything: 2 double bedrooms with AIR CONDITIONING, 2 full bathrooms, a large living room with kitchen and PRIVATE PARKING. Perfect destination for all travellers. There are markets, bar, and restaurants nearby

Home in Nurachi

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 49 reviews4.96 (49)

Casa Mary relaxing holiday 15 minutes from the sea

The house is located 100 meters from the historic center of Nurachi in the province of Oristano, a typical Sardinian town, is an independent house on two levels, on the first floor a lovely open space with kitchen and living room, double bedroom and bathroom. Upstairs double bedroom with terrace and small single bedroom. On the ground floor enclosed outdoor space used as a laundry room with washing machine available for guests, as well as an iron and ironing board. Outdoor parking on the street.

Home in S'arena Scoada

4.88 out of 5 average rating, 67 reviews4.88 (67)

Exclusive Farm

La casa è situata su due piani, offre una meravigliosa vista sulle saline ed è circondata da macchia mediterranea. E' composta da un soggiorno con cucina di circa 55 mq, due stanze da letto matrimoniali, due bagni con doccia uno al piano primo e uno al secondo. All'esterno troverete un patio attrezzato e zona relax sul prato. Barbecue, comode poltrone, sdraio a vostra disposizione per il relax. Tutte le stanze sono dotate di aria condizionata e il Wi-Fi è funzionante in tutti gli ambienti.

Home in Paulilatino

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 200 reviews4.94 (200)

Love Nest in the Heart of Sardinia

The cottage on Via Pia is a historic 1880s house, typically built with local stone: the black basalt of the Abbasanta plateau. "Little house", because everything seems to be in a reduced format... the small windows, the bread oven, the courtyard. A comfortable and welcoming nest of love, suitable for those who want to have sensory experiences (especially gastronomic!) in this less known part of Sardinia, which alternates sea, plains, hills and mountains and a living, authentic tradition

Townhouse in Cuglieri

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 213 reviews4.97 (213)

Elegant home with amazing views

Our comfortable house lies in a peaceful traditional village, a fifteen minute drive from the beautiful beaches of western Sardinia. The roof terrace has wonderful views of the village, mountains, and the sunset over the Mediterranean. Experience good food, wine-tasting, fishing, ancient Nuraghic culture, crafts, yoga, golf, surfing or anything else you wish. We will help you arrange it. If this house is unavailable, please take a look at our other house by clicking on my profile.

Home in Riola Sardo

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 20 reviews4.95 (20)

Antica Dimora Campidanese Su' Entu 6/9 people

Characteristic Casa Campidanese near the most beautiful white quartz beaches of Sardinia (Is Arutas, Mari Ermi, Maimoni), natural oases, the Phoenician sites of the Sinis peninsula, the necropolis of Monte di Prama, 10 km from Oristano. Completely renovated, air-conditioned, and located on one floor for a total of 120 square meters, plus a garden area in the inner courtyard, logged in to eat and relaxation area, it is the ideal place to relax and get away from stress !

Home in Baratili San Pietro

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 63 reviews4.97 (63)

Single house just outside Sinis IUN Q3138

Single house arranged on 2 levels in Baratili San Pietro. On the ground floor, entrance, large kitchenette and studio with a very well-stocked bookshelf. Upstairs 3 double bedrooms, bathroom with shower and ironing room. The house has a large courtyard equipped for alfresco dining. There is also an outdoor kitchen with a wood-burning oven. The house has been recently refurbished. Possibility of extra or separate cribs and beds. Possibility to host animals

Condo in Oristano

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 111 reviews4.93 (111)

Penthouse in the center overlooking the tower

Cozy penthouse in the heart of the historical center of Oristano with large panoramic terrace, living-dining room with large windows, kitchen, hallway, two bedrooms, bathroom. Optimal location to fully enjoy the charm of this medieval city, rich in historical, architectural, cultural places and attractions related to pastime and leisure. Suitable for vacation or work periods in a comfortable atmosphere. Unique Numeric Identification Code (IUN): P0380.

Rental unit in Santa Caterina di Pittinuri

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 103 reviews4.93 (103)

Funtana e Mare Surf Domo I.U.N P3560

The house is located just a few meters from the beach with sand and characteristic pebbles di Santa Caterina di Pittinuri ,quiet and safe sea location !!The house consists of a double room, a room with two single beds that eventually become a double bed, a large dining room, a small kitchen and a bathroom. From the terrace you can enjoy the sea during meals or a good aperitif!! The bay of Santa Caterina is a nice surf spot .

Home in Torre Grande

4.86 out of 5 average rating, 126 reviews4.86 (126)

torregrande beachfront house

Newly built beachfront house, close to beach sports centers, kite/paddle school, tennis courts, pine forest, a few kilometers from the most beautiful beaches in Sinis. The house is equipped with all the comforts, Air conditioning Wi-Fi Mosquito net Washer Dishwasher Barbeque microwave Dishware for the kitchen and Linen. Cleaning fee and linen to be paid on site €60
